author: MVST_100_OR_BUST
body:
Just to be open and because I care more about y'all more than myself or Vogel I do want to mention that there has been a change in the lockup. Not good or bad just changed.

It's been all over the place since last year between Vogel and Wu. But this is the final iteration it seems.

The last iteration was
Wu: 25% locked for 1 year unless above $15 for 20 days. 75% two year locked 

Other Microvast shareholders: 6 months

Vogel/Tuscan: 
50% is locked for 1 year, unless it trades above $12.50 for 20 days. The other 50% is locked for 2 years.



**Now it is**
Wu: 25% locked for 1 year unless above $15 for 20 days. 75% two year locked. (Yes unchanged)

Other Microvast shareholders: 6 months

Vogel/Tuscan:
**READ THIS CAREFULLY**
 
Of 75% of shares, 67% of the shares are locked for 1 year unless above $12.50 for 20 days. The other 33% is locked for 1 year regardless of price. 

Of the other 25% of shares, 50% is locked for 1 year unless it trades over $12 for 20 days. The other 50% is locked for 1 year unless it trades over 15. However he will lose his shares if none of these conditions are met.

These lockups are fairly similar (e.g 67% of 75% is 50%). I don't know if he's fucking with me or I'm just stupid). In summarize it's leaning more positive in my opinion that Vogel got himself a poor man's "FDs" and is either bullish or likes to gamble. Can slightly sell more now if it goes up, but will forfeit ownership to them for $0 if it doesn't.
